themes.scientific_basis: Based on attachment theory and research on emotional security in intimate relationships
themes.description: Evaluates the level of emotional safety and trust partners have established before deepening physical intimacy

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in consent research and studies on boundary establishment in intimate relationships
themes.description: Assesses how effectively partners communicate their boundaries, preferences, and comfort levels regarding physical and emotional intimacy

themes.scientific_basis: Based on sensate focus research and studies on gradual intimacy development
themes.description: Measures couples' ability to respect each other's pace and comfort in progressing through different levels of physical intimacy

themes.scientific_basis: Derived from health psychology research and studies on sexual health communication
themes.description: Examines partners' readiness to discuss health-related aspects of intimacy, including preventive care and safety

themes.scientific_basis: Based on expectation management research and studies on intimate relationship satisfaction
themes.description: Evaluates how well partners understand and align their expectations about physical and emotional intimacy

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in trauma-informed relationship research and studies on healing in intimate relationships
themes.description: Assesses how couples navigate and respect each other's past experiences and their impact on current intimacy

themes.scientific_basis: Based on research on non-verbal communication and emotional attunement in relationships
themes.description: Measures partners' ability to read and respond to non-verbal cues related to comfort and consent in intimate situations

themes.scientific_basis: Derived from research on anxiety and intimate relationship development
themes.description: Evaluates how couples support each other in managing anxiety or stress related to increasing intimacy

themes.scientific_basis: Based on relationship development research and studies on intimacy timing
themes.description: Assesses how well partners coordinate their desired pace of relationship and intimacy development

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in research on values alignment and intimate relationship development
themes.description: Examines how couples integrate their personal values and beliefs about intimacy into their relationship
